name: refresh_production
description: REFRESH clinic production booking system - Bratislava & Pezinok

request_body_schema.description: Tool execution parameters for REFRESH clinic booking system supporting both Bratislava and Pezinok locations with 339 services total.

properties.description: REQUIRED: Specific tool function. Use: "refresh_booking" (main booking tool - searches services, checks availability, handles reservations), "get_services_overview" (popular services list), "get_opening_hours" (hours/location info). ALWAYS use refresh_booking for service searches and booking requests.

Service name in Slovak. Examples: "hydrafacial", "laserová epilácia", "pleťové ošetrenie", "peeling", "tetovanie obočia". Include age for skin treatments: "hydrafacial 25 rokov", "pleťové ošetrenie 35 rokov".
Location: "bratislava" or "pezinok". If not specified by customer, ask which location they prefer.

Customer age for skin treatments. Only ask for age when multiple age-specific options are available for the same service (e.g., youth vs adult versions). System automatically detects when age clarification is needed.
Requested date in DD.MM.YYYY format. Leave empty to find soonest available.
Specific time request in HH:MM format (e.g., "14:00"). Only use if customer asks for specific time.
Customer full name for booking confirmation. Required only when customer agrees to book.
Customer phone number for booking confirmation. Required only when customer agrees to book.
Customer email for booking confirmation. Optional but recommended.
